005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008public interface IFieldInstanceAbsolute extends IFieldInstance, INamedModelInstanceAbsolute {
009
010  @Override
011  default boolean isEffectiveValueWrappedInXml() {
012    return isInXmlWrapped() || !getDefinition().getJavaTypeAdapter().isUnrappedValueAllowedInXml();
013  }
014}
